items.a: Each service has a low entry price that scales with scene length and shot complexity. Shorter, simpler pieces cost less; longer or more complex scenes add incremental fees.
Light, directional tweaks aligned to the agreed concept (up to the stated count). Concept pivots or new scenes are billed as scope additions.
Final deliverables and editable templates are included. Raw project files are available upon request with an additional fee.
Full brand usage for paid deliverables across web and social by default. Broadcast/out-of-home or paid media packages can be added if needed.
Cinematic shorts: 5–7 days to first cut. Identity: 7–10 days. Content Engine: first reel within 48 hours.

items.title: Payment Schedule
items.desc: 50% to book, 50% on delivery. Rush or phased billing available on request.

items.title: Scope Control
items.desc: Deliverables and revision counts are defined up front. Add-ons are priced clearly before work proceeds.

items.title: Cancellations
items.desc: If cancelled after kickoff, work completed to date is invoiced; remaining is released.

items.title: Confidentiality
items.desc: All assets and briefs remain confidential unless you approve public sharing.
